item.title: By: Judith
item.dc:creator: Judith
item.description: <p>Sounds kie your having a great time and will have a problem coming back to reality, mum & dad are tanned and very relaxed and loved S.Africa, Si & Fi sounded like you enjoyed NY and matt and I are looking forward to seeing you for sunday luch which looks like we might be going out for, keep in touch take care to all. Judith & Matt</p>
item.content:encoded: Sounds kie your having a great time and will have a problem coming back to reality, mum & dad are tanned and very relaxed and loved S.Africa, Si & Fi sounded like you enjoyed NY and matt and I are looking forward to seeing you for sunday luch which looks like we might be going out for, keep in touch take care to all. Judith & Matt

item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: <p>Hope the flight is not too tedious - Dad managed to get an emergency exit seat on the way back!! Enjoy Hong Kong and I'll see you early on Thursday.</p>
item.content:encoded: Hope the flight is not too tedious – Dad managed to get an emergency exit seat on the way back!! Enjoy Hong Kong and I’ll see you early on Thursday.
